name: Doors and Drawers
description:
A prototype for a game where you open doors and drawers. 

It was my project for Nokia Jam 4 (2022). But I had no enough time to develop it.

You can take a walk on it but you can't play, since you can't put items back to your inventory.

WASD move, SPACE select, ESC cancel.

WARNING: To exit game you have to go to level 0 stairs and press down (A, 2 or DOWN).
